pkgmetadata.longdescription: Clustering and Classification with the Contaminated Normal // Fits mixtures of multivariate contaminated normal distributions (with eigen-decomposed scale matrices) via the expectation conditional- maximization algorithm under a clustering or classification paradigm Methods are described in Antonio Punzo, Angelo Mazza, and Paul D McNicholas (2018) doi:10.18637/jss.v085.i10.
